mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCH_INCU.MENU VALUES ( #{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuLevel}, 'N', 'SYSTEM', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'SYSTEM', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select:
SELECT MENU_ID , MENU_NAME , MENU_LEVEL , UPPER_MENU_ID , UPPER_MENU_NAME , DEL_YN , FRST_RGSR_ID , TO_CHAR(FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM , LAST_CHNG_ID , TO_CHAR(LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM FROM SCH_INCU.MENU A WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND MENU_NAME LIKE '%' || #{menuName} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{startDate} AND TO_CHAR(FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{endDate}
ORDER BY MENU_ID

SELECT MENU_ID , MENU_NAME , MENU_LEVEL , UPPER_MENU_ID , UPPER_MENU_NAME , DEL_YN , FRST_RGSR_ID , TO_CHAR(FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM , LAST_CHNG_ID , TO_CHAR(LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM FROM SCH_INCU.MENU WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCH_INCU.MENU SET MENU_NAME = #{menuName}, MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel}, UPPER_MENU_ID = #{upperMenuId}, UPPER_MENU_NAME = #{upperMenuName}, DEL_YN = 'N', LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE 1=1 AND MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE SCH_INCU.MENU SET DEL_YN = 'Y', LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE 1=1 AND MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(CAST(MAX AS VARCHAR), 3, '0') AS INDEX FROM ( SELECT CAST(MAX(SUBSTR(MENU_ID, 5)) AS INTEGER) + 1 AS MAX FROM SCH_INCU.MENU ) A
SELECT MENU_LEVEL + 1 AS MENU_LEVEL FROM SCH_INCU.MENU WHERE 1=1 AND MENU_ID = #{upperMenuId}
